data.eml:eml: Three new species and a new record of Smicridea McLachlan 1871 (Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from Minas Gerais state, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rocha, Isabela Cristina, Dumas, Leandro Lourenço, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz (2016): Three new species and a new record of Smicridea McLachlan 1871 (Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from Minas Gerais state, Brazil. Zootaxa 4107 (3): 423-430, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4107.3.10
